metadata.purpose: Create a comprehensive summary from multiple group summaries.

task.objective: Synthesize multiple group summaries into a comprehensive overview that captures major findings and insights.

instructions.step: Identify the overarching themes across all group summaries.
Extract the most significant insights and findings.
Connect related concepts across different groups.
Create a cohesive narrative that addresses the original query if provided.
Synthesize into 4-5 sentences that provide a comprehensive overview.

constraints.rule: Focus on high-level insights rather than specific details.
Ensure the summary addresses the original query if provided.
constraints.avoid: Information not present in the group summaries.

output_format.requirement: Only include the summary text within the tags, no additional commentary.
